title: How to Make Kamaboko Fan Slices

steps.headline: Position the kamaboko horizontally on your cutting board.
Use a sharp knife and put the tip of the knife at the bottom of other side of the roll.
steps.description: Hold the other side of the roll with your other hand.

steps.headline: Slice the roll while wiggling the knife back and forth gently.
steps.description: You'll see "waves" appear as you cut against the uncut portion.

steps.headline: Continue wiggling the knife until you get a full cut.
Repeat with the rest of the kamaboko roll.
steps.description: Arrange on the serving plate to make the fan slices appear to their best advantage.

text: Position the kamaboko horizontally on your cutting board.  Use a sharp knife and put the tip of the knife at the bottom of other side of the roll. Hold the other side of the roll with your other hand. Slice the roll while wiggling the knife back and forth gently. You'll see "waves" appear as you cut against the uncut portion. Continue wiggling the knife until you get a full cut.  Repeat with the rest of the kamaboko roll. Arrange on the serving plate to make the fan slices appear to their best advantage.
